schema_version.title: Schema Version
schema_version.description: The version of the JSON schema that the server uses to validate the object.
schema_version.comment: Do not submit. The version used to validate the object is set by the server. The default should be set to the current version.

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: The unique identifier associated with every object.
uuid.comment: Do not submit. The uuid is set by the server.

notes.title: Notes
notes.comment: Do not submit. A place for the DACC to keep information that does not have a place in the schema.

aliases.title: Aliases
aliases.description: Lab specific identifiers to reference an object.
aliases.comment: The purpose of this field is to provide a link into the lab LIMS and to facilitate shared objects.

items.title: Lab Alias
items.description: A lab specific identifier to reference an object.
items.comment: Current convention is colon separated lab name and lab identifier. (e.g. john-doe:42).

creation_timestamp.title: Creation Timestamp
creation_timestamp.description: The date the object was created.
creation_timestamp.comment: Do not submit. The date the object is created is assigned by the server.

submitted_by.title: Submitted By
submitted_by.comment: Do not submit. The user that created the object is assigned by the server.

submitter_comment.title: Submitter Comment
submitter_comment.description: Additional information specified by the submitter to be displayed as a comment on the portal.

description.title: Description
description.description: A plain text description of the object.

accession.title: Accession
accession.description: A unique identifier to be used to reference the object prefixed with IGVF.
accession.comment: Do not submit. The accession is assigned by the server.

alternate_accessions.title: Alternate Accessions
alternate_accessions.description: Accessions previously assigned to objects that have been merged with this object.
alternate_accessions.comment: Do not submit. Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.

items.title: Alternate Accession
items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only accessions of objects that have status equal replaced will work here.

collections.title: Collections
collections.description: Some samples are part of particular data collections.
collections.comment: Do not submit. Collections are for DACC use only.

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the metadata object.
status.comment: Do not submit.  This is set by admins along the process of metadata submission.

revoke_detail.title: Revoke Detail
revoke_detail.description: Explanation of why an object was transitioned to the revoked status.
revoke_detail.comment: Do not submit. This is set by admins when an object is revoked.

lab.title: Lab
lab.comment: Required. See lab.json for list of available identifiers.

award.title: Award
award.comment: Required. See award.json for list of available identifiers.

href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

url.title: URL
url.description: An external resource with additional information.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Documents that provide additional information (not data file).

items.title: Document
items.description: A document that provides additional information (not data file).

items.title: Source
items.comment: See source.json or lab.json for available identifiers.

lot_id.title: Lot ID
lot_id.description: The lot identifier provided by the originating lab or vendor.

product_id.title: Product ID
product_id.description: The product identifier provided by the originating lab or vendor.

publication_identifiers.title: Publication Identifiers
publication_identifiers.description: The publication identifiers that provide more information about the object.

items.title: Publication Identifier
items.description: A publication identifier that provides more information about the object.

reference_files.title: Reference Files
reference_files.description: Link to the reference files used to generate this file.

items.description: Link to a reference file used to generate this file.

transcriptome_annotation.title: Transcriptome Annotation
transcriptome_annotation.description: The annotation and version of the reference resource.

assembly.title: Genome Assembly
assembly.description: Genome assembly applicable for the reference data.
